newsitem.title: USA: Lasertechnics to add ID printer system.
newsitem.headline: Lasertechnics to add ID printer system.

text.p: Lasertechnics Inc said on Friday its Sandia unit has added a mid-range card printing system for printing identification cards to its product line.
The printer is expected to be available in the fourth quarter of this year, Lasertechnics said.
The systems' costs will range from $7,000 to $20,000, depending upon the options selected, Lasertechnics said.
The system is meant specifically for decentralized issuance of identification cards, such as drivers' licenses and immigration credentials, the company said.
